name: cog-second-brain
description: A self-evolving second brain system using Claude Code, Obsidian markdown files, and Git version control. Features specialized AI agents for knowledge management, daily intelligence briefings, and strategic insights extraction.

commands.name: onboarding
commands.description: Personalize COG for your workflow - creates profile, interests, and watchlist files (run this first!)

commands.name: daily-brief
commands.description: Generate personalized news intelligence with verified sources (7-day freshness requirement)

commands.name: braindump
commands.description: Quick capture of raw thoughts with intelligent domain classification and competitive intelligence extraction

commands.name: weekly-checkin
commands.description: Cross-domain pattern analysis and strategic reflection for weekly review

commands.name: knowledge-consolidation
commands.description: Build frameworks from scattered insights across all braindumps and notes

agents.name: brain-dump-analyst
agents.description: Transforms stream-of-consciousness into structured insights with domain classification and competitive intelligence extraction

agents.name: news-curator
agents.description: Finds verified news with strict 7-day freshness requirement, cross-references sources, and generates personalized briefings

features: Privacy-first architecture with strict domain separation
Plain text markdown files (no database, no vendor lock-in)
Multi-device sync via iCloud (iPhone, iPad, Mac)
Git version control for tracking thinking evolution

requirements.git: Optional but recommended for version control

installation.quickStart: Clone repo into Obsidian vault, copy .claude directory, run /onboarding

directoryStructure.00-inbox: Temporary processing area with profile and interests files
